nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_695
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: At the meeting they discussed, among other things, the present economic situation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_696
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The more I learned about the nature, the more absorbed I became in its mystery.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_697
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The doctor recommends that those stressed people should try something new, interesting and challenging in order to give their negative feelings an outlet.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_698
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The teacher gives more homework to the student who has bad grades instead of cutting it down.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_699
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: By contrast, American parents are more likely to attribute their children's success to natural talent.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_700
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: One of a teacher's priorities is to stimulate students' interests and their creativity.
